description:
^3 was the last game I made in Scratch.

I started Scratch in 5th grade - it was my introduction to programming, and how I fell in love with creating games. I had the idea for a 2D platformer played on a 3D cube in middle school. I tried on multiple occasions, but could not figure out how to actually create my idea. Turns out Scratch wasn't intended for 3D games. I gave up. Eventually the time had come where I had outgrew Scratch. But I knew couldn't leave until I created the idea that I spent years dreaming of. ^3 was released in my senior year of high school, over 5 years after I initially thought of the idea.

Upon it's release, ^3 went viral on Scratch, acquiring over 30,000 views and over 4,000 likes.

Controls

Move: WASD / Arrow Keys
Jump: W / Up Arrow
Rewind: Z (hold)
Reset: R
Next Level: S / Down Arrow

Credits

Programming / Design: AlphaAxle
Music: Ketsa
Triangle Filler Script: TheLogFather
